Title: Go with Honor, Friend
Description:
This mission ended up being far more than any of us expected, $n, and you did very well. I shudder to think of what would have happened without you here. 

Some time back, the King commissioned a set of armor be made. Armor to adorn our greatest heroes. 

You have proven yourself more than deserving of such honor.

Meet me in the Valley of Heroes, $n.
ObjectivesText: Meet Shaw in the Valley of Heroes in Stormwind.
